course_name: Pathophysiology, Pharmacological & Clinical Principles Used in Diagnosis of Di
description: Abnormal function in animals, based on the study of pathological, biochemical, physiological, pharmacological/toxicological & nutritional processes. Basic interpretation of laboratory data. Students must enrol in VETS3011 for both semesters.
prerequisites: VETS2006, VETS2011, ANIM2503, VETS2007, VETS2008, VETS2012
restricted: Enrolment restricted to Veterinary Science students only
